title: How are there 100+ minute games?
body: It's some kind of glitch but I'm not really sure how it's happening. There's like two people on my friend list where every single time they play a game, and I'm talking to them and they're saying "yeah I'll be done soon" and yet their games are always 100+ minutes long.

replies.body:
Your system clock may be off and causing your client to display the wrong times of games. [This guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660#wq1) should assist you in correcting this to see if it was causing the issue.

Let me know if this resolved it for you.
